import { Add, PlayArrow, ThumbDownAltOutlined, ThumbUpAltOutlined } from "@material-ui/icons" import { useState } from "react"; import "./listItem.scss" export default function ListItem({index}) { const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false); const trailer = "https://vimeo.com/551282414" return (
setIsHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={()=>setIsHovered(false)} >
) }
